flawed_nl_solution:
He increases the length to 13+2=<<13+2=15>>15 feet
He increases the width to 18+2=<<18+2=23>>23 feet
So the rooms are 15*23=<<15*23=345>>345 square feet
So he has 1+3=<<1+3=4>>4 rooms of this size
So he has 4*345=<<4*345=1380>>1380 square feet of rooms this size
He also has one room of size 345*2=<<345*2=690>>690 square feet
So he has 1380+690=<<1380+690=2070>>2070 square feet of rooms
#### 2070

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 23. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
